template.name: Default Template V8
template.description:
Default Template for SobiPro 2.6.x (default8)

This template supports Bootstrap 5 only!!. It supports Font Awesome 3, Font Awesome 4 and Font Awesome 5 elements and styles.

Set the framework to Bootstrap 5 and the used font in the section configuration.

files.file: Default category view template with a top menu, navigation, entries and categories.
Template for the alpha index (letters) only.
Template for the alpha menu. Fields chooser and calls the alpha index (letters) template.
Template for the category list (categoriesLoop). Calls the template for a single category.
Template for a single category in the category list.
Template to output one field in entry form. Called from default loop in edit.xsl.
Template to display all entries (entriesLoop) within a category or the search function. Build the structure of all entries and calls the "vCard" template while displaying single entry.
Template to load Google fonts. Will be called from the topmenu template.
Global template variables.
Displays the managing functions like edit entry, approve aso, within an entry.
Displays the message bar.
Template for the site navigation.
Template to output one field in the search. Called from default loop.
Template to output one field in vCard and details view. Called from default loop.
Template to output the entry ordering box in the search results view.
Template to output the entry ordering box in the category views.
Template for the top menu.
Template to display single entry within a category, any listing view or the search function.
